column5: Beautiful Texas Hill County Retreat. 34 miles. to Austin. Jacuzzi Hot tub & Butlers Kitchen. Boat Dock & swimming. Use of kayak , Paddle Board, one of a kind pedal boat, large supply of floats & life jackets. Dock has stereo & TV with DVD for movie night at dock, furniture! Fishing from dock Private entrance, quiet. Great views. Large fenced yard for well behaved pets. Great area for walking. Peaceful. Wonderful sunrises. Dock your boat here! Smoking only allowed outside.
column8: Lake Travis Waterfront Hill Country Jacuzzi & Dock
